languages.text: "Я придумал{mf||а} развлечение получше казни — кто поймает и притащит мне скомороха, получит право поцеловать перстень Звездн{mf|ого|ой} Госпо{mf|дина|жи}!"
"I have thought of a better entertainment. Forget the execution — whoever brings me the fool will receive the honour of kissing the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s signet!"
languages.original_text: "Я придумал{mf||а} развлечение получше казни — кто поймает и притащит мне скомороха, получит право поцеловать перстень Звездн{mf|ого|ой} Госпо{mf|дина|жи}!"

traits.locale_text: "I have thought of a better entertainment. Forget the execution, whoever brings me the clown will get to kiss the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s ring!"
"I have thought of a better entertainment. Forget the execution, whoever brings me the clown will get to kiss the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s ring!"
"I have thought of a better entertainment. Forget the execution — whoever brings me the clown will receive the honour of kissing the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s ring!"
"I have thought of a better entertainment. Forget the execution — whoever brings me the clown will receive the honour of kissing the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s ring!"
"I have thought of a better entertainment. Forget the execution — whoever brings me the fool will receive the honour of kissing the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s signet!"
"I have thought of a better entertainment. Forget the execution — whoever brings me the fool will receive the honour of kissing the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s signet!"

languages.text: “我想到了更有趣的娱乐方式。别管什么行刑了，给我抓住那个小丑。谁能抓住他，谁就有权亲吻来自上界的大人手上的戒指！”
languages.original_text: "I have thought of a better entertainment. Forget the execution — whoever brings me the fool will receive the honour of kissing the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s signet!"

traits.locale_text: “我想到了更有趣的娱乐方式。别管什么行刑了，给我抓住那个小丑。谁能抓住他，谁就有权亲吻来自上界的大人手上的戒指！”

languages.text: «Se me ha ocurrido un pasatiempo más adecuado. Olvide la ejecución; ¡quien me traiga al bufón tendrá el honor de besar el anillo {mf|del Señor|de la Señora} Celestial!».
languages.original_text: "I have thought of a better entertainment. Forget the execution — whoever brings me the fool will receive the honour of kissing the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s signet!"

traits.locale_text: «Se me ha ocurrido un pasatiempo más adecuado. Olvide la ejecución; ¡quien me traiga al bufón tendrá el honor de besar el anillo {mf|del Señor|de la Señora} Celestial!».

languages.text: "Aklıma daha eğlenceli bir şey geldi. İnfazı boş verin. Kim bana soytarıyı getirirse Semavi {mf|Lordunuzun|Leydinizin} mührünü öpme şerefine nail olacak!"
languages.original_text: "I have thought of a better entertainment. Forget the execution — whoever brings me the fool will receive the honour of kissing the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s signet!"

traits.locale_text: "Aklıma daha eğlenceli bir şey geldi. İnfazı boş verin. Kim bana soytarıyı getirirse Semavi {mf|Lordunuzun|Leydinizin} mührünü öpme şerefine nail olacak!"

languages.text: 「もっといい娯楽を思いついた。処刑のことは忘れて、その道化を{mf|俺|私}の元に連れてきた者に天の{mf|君|姫}の印章指輪にキスする栄誉を与えよう！」
languages.original_text: "I have thought of a better entertainment. Forget the execution — whoever brings me the fool will receive the honour of kissing the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s signet!"

traits.locale_text: 「もっといい娯楽を思いついた。処刑のことは忘れて、その道化を{mf|俺|私}の元に連れてきた者に天の{mf|君|姫}の印章指輪にキスする栄誉を与えよう！」

languages.text: « J'ai une meilleure idée pour nous divertir. Oubliez l'exécution ; quiconque m'amènera le bouffon aura l'honneur d'embrasser la chevalière de Sa Céleste Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "I have thought of a better entertainment. Forget the execution — whoever brings me the fool will receive the honour of kissing the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s signet!"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai une meilleure idée pour nous divertir. Oubliez l'exécution ; quiconque m'amènera le bouffon aura l'honneur d'embrasser la chevalière de Sa Céleste Seigneurie. »

languages.text: "Ich habe mir eine bessere Unterhaltung einfallen lassen. Vergesst die Hinrichtung. Wer mir den Narren bringt, erhält die große Ehre, den Siegelring {mf|des himmlischen Herrn|der himmlischen Herrin} küssen zu dürfen!"
languages.original_text: "I have thought of a better entertainment. Forget the execution — whoever brings me the fool will receive the honour of kissing the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'s signet!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe mir eine bessere Unterhaltung einfallen lassen. Vergesst die Hinrichtung. Wer mir den Narren bringt, erhält die große Ehre, den Siegelring {mf|des himmlischen Herrn|der himmlischen Herrin} küssen zu dürfen!"
